title: Chemistry.com Rebrand
body:
## While working as a freelancer I was fortunate enough to work on several fortune 500 brands. One of those brands was Chemistry.com.

### ABOUT THE PROJECT

Under the Creative Direction of [Stephen Edmondson](https://web.archive.org/web/20180817134742/https://www.linkedin.com/in/stephenedmondson) our team was tasked with establishing a new look for Chemistry.com from the ground up.

![Chemestry.com Rebrand](/images/uploads/chem-interst-imac.jpg "STARTING FRESH MEANT REDESIGNING EVERY INTERACTION THE USER WILL HAVE.")

Every pixel the end user would see was carefully thought out to best deliver the most enjoyable experience

![Chemestry.com Guidelines](/images/uploads/chem_rebrand_styles.jpg "CHEMISTRY.COM WEB STYLES ARE PIXEL PERFECT.")

At the end of the day we got a project that would withstand the test of time

![Chemestry.com Timeline](/images/uploads/chem-imac-stream.jpg)
